html: Hands, which were nailed to the cross. Septuagint, "I have delineated thy walls on my hands, and thou art before me always." (Haydock)— The Assyrians wore such characters on their hands or necks. (Lucian) (Leviticus xix. 28.) (Calmet)— Christ will always love his Church, which is of all times and nations. (Worthington)
